title: [GAMEPLAY] Velkoz movement bug
body:
Usually at the start of the game, Velkoz has some awkward movement (moving without animation).
Also, when used an ability and tried to move as we cast the spell, Velkoz will just freeze into a starfish shape until another AA or casting another spell.

It doesn't really affect the flow of the game, it's just awkward. Thanks.

replies.body:
Hey Francooooooo,

Thanks for the report! We're looking into this issue! ^-^
